headline: Why Merck, Black Hills, And Virtus Investment Partners Are Winners For Passive Income
summary: Companies with a long history of paying dividends and consistently hiking them remain appealing to income-focused investors. Merck, Black Hills, and Virtus Investment Partners have rewarded shareholders for years and recently announced dividend increases. These companies currently offer dividend yields of around 4-6%.
